path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - KatanaInu NFT System - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Anyone can withdraw all royalty fund
findings.description: In `withdraw` function, there is no check to ensure that only wallets with proportions for royalties can withdraw fund. As a result, anyone can withdraw the entire balance of the treasury.

findings.title: configureRoyaltiesProportions the second time will make proportions invalid
findings.description: When configuring royalty proportions, if we configure the same collection again and the new receivers are different from the old ones, the mapping s_royalty_configures will become invalid as it is not removed old records but adding new ones.

findings.title: Users can control _discount and make free mint if signer is set to address 0
findings.description: If the contract sets signer to address 0 (disable signing requirement for minting), users can control _discount and set it to equal to _amount to make free mint.

findings.title: Signature replay
findings.description: In the `makeMintingAction` function, signature is not checked whether it is used or not. User can replay the signature and mint many times.

findings.title: Unsafe initialize
findings.description: The Configurations contract grants admin roles for msg.sender while calling initialize, allowing attackers to front run and steal admin roles right after the contract is deployed.
